column1: Smoque BBQ////From a gal who knows barbecue
column2: Smoque was incredible. Party of four and we wanted to try as much as possible so we ordered a bunch of different items. Pulled pork
column7: mac and cheese and coleslaw. EVERYTHING was excellent but standouts IMHO were brisket
column10: wait. That's almost everything we ordered! Â I wanted to bathe myself in those delicious
column11: smoky beans!! The bun for my pulled pork sandwich was just a tad sweet which complimented the meat without overwhelming. Also loved the different type sauces.
